May 8, 2003

State department report on terrorism shows a decline since 1969

The “war on terror” comes at a time when terrorism is at its lowest total since 1969: In its annual report to Congress on terrorism, the State Department said that the 199 recorded terrorist incidents last year represented a 44 percent drop from the previous year, and was the lowest total since 1969. International Herald Tribune

What is an RSS feed? That link has a lot of info, but the short answer is that it is simply a way of formating content so that it can easily be used by other websites, as well as specialized software. May 8, 2003

Infectious Disease Rates Rising Among Prisoners

At a time when less than 2 percent of the U.S. population is infected with hepatitis C, 29.7 percent of Maryland prisoners had it, said Liza Solomon, the agency’s director. Talk Left
